message.landmanager.protection.interact: Cannot interact with blocks in this area!

message.landmanager.home.notMember: You are not a member of this area!

lm.command.player: You need to be a player to use this command
lm.command.data: Failed to get areas from the world with dimension id %s
lm.command.noPerm: You do not have permission to edit the area '%s'!
lm.command.notInArea: You are not standing in an area!
lm.command.area.usage: Use '/lm area <areaName>' to see details about the area
lm.command.area.name: Area Name:
lm.command.area.not_exist: There is no area with the name '%s'!
lm.command.areas.usage: Use '/lm areas [page] [areaNameRegex]' to list all the areas, optionally with a regex filter
lm.command.areas.title: Areas - Page %s / %s
lm.command.claim.usage: Use '/lm claim [areaName]' to claim an area. Providing no area will try claiming the area you're standing in
lm.command.claim.disabled: Area claiming is not enabled! Ask an OP to allocate you an area.
lm.command.claim.request.success: Claim request successfully created for area %s
lm.command.claim.request.failed: Claim request failed - you already have one for the area %s!
lm.command.claim.request.opMessage: ยง7New claim request (%s) from %s for area %s
lm.command.members.add.usage: Use '/lm members add <areaName> <playerName>' to add the player to the area
lm.command.members.add.already: %s is already a member of area %s
lm.command.members.remove.usage: Use '/lm members remove <areaName> <playerName>' to remove the player from the area
lm.command.members.remove.already: %s already isn't a member of area %s
lm.command.myareas.usage: Use '/lm myareas [page] [areaNameRegex]' to list all your areas, optionally with a regex filter
lm.command.myareas.title: My Areas - Page %s / %s
lm.command.setowner.usage: Use '/lm setowner <areaName> [playerName]' to set the player as the new owner of the area. OPs can provide no player to remove the owner
lm.command.setowner.op: You must be an OP or owner of the area to use this command
lm.command.setowner.success: The new owner of the area %s is %s
lm.command.show.usage: Use '/lm show [areaName]'. Providing no area will show all areas nearby
lm.command.approve.usage: Use '/lm op approve <requestId>' to approve a claim request. Check for requests using the 'requests' command
lm.command.approve.success: Approved request %s - %s is now the owner of area %s
lm.command.approve.playerMessage: Your request for area %s has been approved by %s!
lm.command.delete.usage: Use '/lm op delete <areaName>' to delete an area
lm.command.delete.notify: The area %s that you were a member of has been deleted!
lm.command.disapprove.usage: Use '/lm op disapprove <requestId>' to disapprove a claim request. Check for requests using the 'requests' command
lm.command.disapprove.playerMessage: Your request for area %s has been disapproved by %s!
lm.command.requests.usage: Use '/lm op requests [page] [areaNameRegex]'. You can display requests for an area without providing the page
lm.command.requests.title: Requests - Page %s / %s
lm.command.requests.not_exist: There is no request with the ID %s!
lm.command.explosions.usage: Use '/lm explosions <areaName>' to toggle explosion damage
lm.command.explosions.usage.op: Use '/lm op explosions <areaName>' to toggle explosion damage
lm.command.hostiles.usage: Use '/lm hostiles <areaName>' to toggle hostile entity spawning
lm.command.hostiles.usage.op: Use '/lm op hostiles <areaName>' to toggle hostile entity spawning
lm.command.hostiles.success: Set hostile entity spawning to %s for area %s
lm.command.interactions.usage: Use '/lm interactions <areaName>' to toggle player interactions (right clicking) with blocks
lm.command.interactions.usage.op: Use '/lm op interactions <areaName>' to toggle player interactions (right clicking) with blocks
lm.command.passives.usage: Use '/lm passives <areaName>' to toggle passive entity spawning
lm.command.passives.usage.op: Use '/lm op passives <areaName>' to toggle passive entity spawning
lm.command.passives.success: Set passive entity spawning to %s for area %s
lm.command.rename.usage: Use '/lm rename <areaName> <newAreaName>' to rename an area
lm.command.rename.usage.op: Use '/lm op rename <areaName> <newAreaName>' to rename an area
lm.command.rename.success: You successfully renamed the area %s to %s
lm.command.rename.invalid: The new area name '%s' is invalid! It must not contain spaces or special characters other than '_'
lm.command.tool.usage: Use '/lm tool' to give yourself the admin tool
lm.command.tool.usage.op: Use '/lm op tool' to give yourself the admin tool
lm.command.tool.inventory: No room in inventory for tool
